Steps.Message: Following on from our previous message, we can now confirm we have switched power off to 24 properties. This is to allow our engineers to safely repair a faulty underground cable. If your electricity has gone off, you can keep updated by texting POWER followed by your full postcode to 80876 (e.g. POWER IP3 8AA). Standard text fees apply.

We became aware of a power cut at 15:04. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

Logs.Comment: Following on from our previous message, we can now confirm we have switched power off to 24 properties. This is to allow our engineers to safely repair a faulty underground cable. If your electricity has gone off, you can keep updated by texting POWER followed by your full postcode to 80876 (e.g. POWER IP3 8AA). Standard text fees apply.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We had to turn off power in your area so our engineers could safely carry out emergency repairs to the network.
